title: Moody Gets the Blues
description: The first book in a new series! Scott Moody, out of the psychiatric hospital for three months drives a taxi through Spokane to pay the rent. He decides to become a private investigator after hallucinations about Humphrey Bogart. His first case is an investigation into the disappearance of a local real estate mogul whose wife turns out to have been Moody's ex-girlfriend.
author: Steve Oliver
